name: Does it sound like me?
description:
"Does it sound like me ?" is a psychological horror game where a criminal falls into a coma and fights his subconscious evil mind while everything is falling apart.

This game was submitted to the BYOG game jam, made in a total of 48 hours

(Storyline buggy and incomplete but still can be completed, nothing game-breaking)

Controls: 

WASD/L Stick - Move

F/LB - Get Rid of your evil self

Click/B - Interact
